code: @Test public void stopsMeterRegistryWhenContextIsClosed() {     this.contextRunner.withUserConfiguration(BaseConfiguration.class).run((context) -> {         AppOpticsMeterRegistry registry = context.getBean(AppOpticsMeterRegistry.class).         assertThat(registry.isClosed()).isFalse().         context.close().         assertThat(registry.isClosed()).isTrue().     }). }
@Bean public AppOpticsMeterRegistry customRegistry(AppOpticsConfig config, Clock clock) {     return new AppOpticsMeterRegistry(config, clock). }
